detailResultFields.value:

detailResultFields.value:

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
This introductory course provides a foundational and comprehensive exploration of literary analysis, focusing on Spanish and Latin American short texts authored by diverse writers and addressing the major themes of Hispanic literature. 
This course is a required course for all Minor and Major students for Spanish.

See the full course overview: https://fhis.ubc.ca/course-description/SPAN221/ 

Contact us here: https://fhis.ubc.ca/undergraduate-advising-contact-form/

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
If the course is full please register in the waitlist. If you have any course enquiries please contact courses@stat.ubc.ca.
Any reserved seats not taken will be released to the general pool after August 6th.

uiLabels.WDRES.FACETEDSEARCH.SymanSyntax:
Boolean logic can be expressed using AND, OR, NOT, and (). 
Exact phrases can be surrounded by double quotation marks. 
Example: ("software engineer" OR computer science) AND ~manager~.
